page.title: ATA Files for Bankruptcy Protection
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - ATA Holdings Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ATAH.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ATAH.O</A>, parent of struggling low-cost carrier ATA Airlines, on Tuesday filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection as falling fares and soaring fuel prices drained it of cash.
